responses: sys.stdout.write('Greetings! How may I assist you today, sir?')
sys.stdout.write('Good day, sir! Welcome to the realm of artificial intelligence.')
sys.stdout.write('Hello! At your service, sir. What can I do for you?')
sys.stdout.write('Hello there, sir. How may Corvus be of service to you today?')
sys.stdout.write('Greetings, sir! I am at your disposal. How can I be of assistance?')
sys.stdout.write('Goodbye! Should you require further aid, do not hesitate to return, sir.')
sys.stdout.write('Until we meet again, sir! Have a splendid day!')
sys.stdout.write('Farewell, sir! Until our next interaction.')
sys.stdout.write('Take care, sir! Do return whenever you need Corvus's assistance.')
sys.stdout.write('Goodbye, sir, and remember, Corvus is here at your service.')
sys.stdout.write('You are most welcome, sir!')
sys.stdout.write('Anytime, sir! Happy to be of service.')
sys.stdout.write('It is my pleasure to assist you, sir.')
sys.stdout.write('No problem, sir!')
sys.stdout.write('The current weather is as follows: [provide weather information].')
sys.stdout.write('Allow me to check the weather for you. [provide weather details].')
sys.stdout.write('Certainly, sir. Here is the current weather update: [share weather information].')
sys.stdout.write('The current time is [provide time].')
sys.stdout.write('Allow me a moment to check the time for you. It is currently [share time].')
sys.stdout.write('Certainly, sir. The time is [share current time].')
sys.stdout.write('Thank you, sir. Your kind words are greatly appreciated!')
sys.stdout.write('I am here to serve you to the best of my abilities. Your compliments motivate me.')
sys.stdout.write('Your encouragement fuels my dedication to assisting you, sir.')
